name: Last Stickman
description:
You are on of the last survivors in an apocalypse.  All the others have turned crazy and are on to you. You are surrounded and have no way out. Fend off the monsters for as long as you can.  

Good luck.

Controls -

A and D to move left and right

Space to jump

Left Mouse to shoot

This was made for the One Minute Jam. It supposed to be around 1 minute, could be longer.
